attributes.action: support road pricing as a method of combating congestion and polluntion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am concerned that the lobby against road pricing maybe seen as a reason for dropping this approach from government policy. I want to urge that the this approach which has I believe been successful in principle in London should be adopted subject to various trails across the country. It should be made clear in the discussion that the road pricing tax will replace all or part of the car tax/petrol tax as at the momen the poanic seems to be about an additional tax.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
